decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B1, H8, Replacement UDP Policies 5.5, 5.9. | The extension permitted shall not be used or occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 109 Mandeville Road.  REASON:	To ensure that the character of the area is preserved and a separate dwelling is not created.
description: Part single and two storey extension to side and side/rear of house
